name: Paris
description: The City of Light, known for its art, fashion, gastronomy, and culture.

name: Tokyo
description: A vibrant metropolis known for its tech innovation, historic temples, and diverse neighborhoods.

name: New York City
description: The city that never sleeps, famous for its iconic skyline, Broadway shows, and diverse cuisine.

name: Rome
description: The Eternal City, known for its ancient ruins, art, and delicious pasta.

name: Sydney
description: A stunning harbor city with iconic landmarks like the Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge.
